item.description: We will hike up Mount Osceola in the White Mountains. This is one of the easier 4000 footers. See here for a good description of the trail: http://www.hikenewengland.com/Osceola991030.html We will be trying to facilitate car-pooling but at this point, based on early indications of interest, we have more people needing a ride than we have rides available. If you have a car, you are encouraged to attend. If you need a ride, it will be first come first served. We will meet at Sullivan Square T station so that drivers and riders can meet up.
item.name: Godless hiking in the White Mountains
